page.title: 06A Smallholding, Harpenden.
page.content: My name is{Victoria Dulieu}and my family and{I live on a smallholding. It is called{Bower Heath farm}and is in Harpenden,{Hertfordshire.}We raise cattle keep{Shire Horses, goats, sheep {and some chickens.}We also have{four {dogs, five cats and a rabbit}on our 25 acres. We raise the cattle for beef, and we show the Shire Horses as well as breed from them.{The goat is milked {twice a day}for our own supply of milk and she usually gives about{5 pints. {The chickens are fed once a day}and we collect their eggs which are often still warm.{We pump our own water out {of the ground}with an electric pump; each and every day it is pumped for our own use and for the animals in the fields.
